actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the continued need for energy conservation.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should extend the building temperature restrictions program beyond the April 16, 1980 termination date.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the continued need for energy conservation.
